name: Agency for International Development

painPoints.point: Global IT infrastructure and systems modernization for worldwide mission operations and program management
Cybersecurity and data protection critical for sensitive international development and humanitarian information
Program management and monitoring system improvements for international development projects
Grant and contract management system modernization for international partners and organizations
Data analytics and reporting capabilities for program effectiveness and impact measurement
Legacy system integration and data migration challenges across global operations
IT acquisition and management challenges including project delays, budget overruns, and need for improved oversight and mature acquisition practices affecting global development IT systems
painPoints.source: GAO High-Risk List 2025 - Improving IT Acquisitions and Management

Grant and Contract Management System Modernization

secondary: GAO Reports on USAID IT Systems and Program Management
